resources.string:
Programming by Oskar Wiksten
Map tilesets graphics by telles0808
Item tilesets graphics by Ails
Hero graphics by RedKnight91
Additional monster graphics by nacred
Game forums provided by Scott Devaney
Additional maps done by Michael Schmid
Additional programming by Samuel Plentz
Additional programming by Uwe Jugel
Additional programming by Olivier Samyn
Additional programming by Ethan Wessel
Additional graphics by Karvis
Russian translation by Dreamer...
Italian translation by k6blue, liogiu and Joker
French translation by LeSanglier and Misty Soul
German translation by Bomber and Samuel Plentz
English proofreading by taws34
Forum moderated by Tim Davis
Forum moderated by Josh Kloos
Forum moderated by Travis Miller

Monster tileset graphics by rltiles.sourceforge.net
Part of (or All) the graphic tiles used in this program is the public domain roguelike tileset "RLTiles". Some of the tiles have been modified by Oskar Wiksten. You can find the original tileset at http://rltiles.sf.net

Some of the graphic data in this software are free game resources distributed by REFMAP (http://www.tekepon.net/fsm). You must not use the graphic data which is in this software, for the purpose except playing this game. When you want to get these resources, go to the website above.
